revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (3), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (3)

|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88AP310; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 624<!-- 624 / 806 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H8BCS0SI0MBR; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H8BCS0SI0MBR; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 00:0B:6C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe (USB only) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = Overdrive-XXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Overdrive-[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Sierra Wireless |manuf_model = AirCard W801 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/08/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SyChip WLAN8688 |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8688; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC5728V |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (USB only) |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Beceem;BCSM250; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2stand = CDMA/WiMAX
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The SK hynix RAM/DDR chip appears to be [http://www.ubmtechinsights.com/reports-and-subscriptions/open-market-reports/Report-Profile/?ReportKey=7371 256MB Flash + 128MB RAM].
*The device has a [[Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC5728V]] card on-board. :FCC ID: N7N-MC5728 - WiMAX Mini PCIe (USB) Card :The WiMAX portion is manned by a [[Beceem]] BCSM250. *The 802.11b/g wireless module is from ''SyChip'' and may be [[Marvell]] :88W8688 based (marked 000B6C, BD92A9, VYKFHK, LBWA-EP)
The default SSID for the devices seems to be '''Overdrive-XXX''' where :'''XXX''' is the last three hex digits of the WiFi MAC address.
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.sierrawireless.com/productsandservices/AirCard/MobileHotspots/AirCardW801.aspx Product page] ([[Sierra Wireless]] AirCard W801) {{•}} [http://support.sprint.com/global/pdf/user_guides/sierra_wireless/overdrive_3g4g/overdrive_3g4g_sierra_wireless_ug.pdf Manual]
